import bgImage from"assets/images/bg-reset-cover.jpeg";import authService from"services/auth-service";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ForgotPassword(){const[isDemo,setIsDemo]=useState(false);const[input,setEmail]=useState({email:""});const[error,setError]=useState({err:false,textError:""});const[notification,setNotification]=useState(false);const changeHandler=e=>{setEmail({[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};useEffect(()=>{setIsDemo(process.env.REACT_APP_IS_DEMO==="true");},[]);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const mailFormat=/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;if(input.email.trim().length===0||!input.email.trim().match(mailFormat)){setError({err:true,textError:"The email must be valid"});return;}// somthing not right with the data
const myData={data:{type:"password-forgot",attributes:{redirect_url:`${process.env.REACT_APP_URL}/auth/reset-password`,...input}}};try{if(isDemo==false){const res=await authService.forgotPassword(myData);setError({err:false,textError:""});}setNotification(true);}catch(err){console.error(err);if(err.hasOwnProperty("errors")){setError({err:true,textError:err.errors.email[0]});}return null;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CoverLayout,{coverHeight:"50vh",image:bgImage,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MDBox,{variant:"gradient",bgColor:"info",borderRadius:"lg",coloredShadow:"success",mx:2,mt:-3,py:2,mb:1,textAlign:"center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDTypography,{variant:"h3",fontWeight:"medium",color:"white",mt:1,children:"Reset Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDTypography,{display:"block",variant:"button",color:"white",my:1,children:"You will receive an e-mail in maximum 60 seconds"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBox,{pt:4,pb:3,px:3,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MDBox,{component:"form",role:"form",method:"POST",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBox,{mb:4,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDInput,{type:"email",label:"Email",variant:"standard",fullWidth:true,value:input.email,name:"email",onChange:changeHandler,error:error.err})}),error.err&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDTypography,{variant:"caption",color:"error",fontWeight:"light",children:error.textError}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBox,{mt:6,mb:1,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDButton,{variant:"gradient",color:"info",fullWidth:true,type:"submit",children:"reset"})})]})})]}),notification&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDAlert,{color:"info",mt:"20px",dismissible:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDTypography,{variant:"body2",color:"white",children:isDemo?"You can't update the password in the demo version":"Please check your email to reset your password."})})]});}export default ForgotPassword;
